data.title: Hamilton County Democratic Party Endorsements
data.meta_description: The Hamilton County Democratic Party has endorsed the following candidates and issues: Cheviot Sam Keller for Mayor Stephanie Hawk for Council Cincinnati Anna Albi for Council Jeff Cramerding for Council â€¦
data.text:
The Hamilton County Democratic Party has endorsed the following candidates and issues:

Cheviot

Sam Keller for Mayor

Stephanie Hawk for Council

Cincinnati

Anna Albi for Council

Jeff Cramerding for Council

Reggie Harris for Council

Mark Jeffreys for Council

Scotty Johnson for Council

Seth Walsh for Council

Kendra Mapp

Theresa Harper Kolodzik for Trustee

Neil Kelly for Council

Wendy Stickler Biederman

Jason Simmons

Jeff Girton for 3rd Ward Council

Keith Moore for Director of Law

Alice Rericha
